venue.name: Rabb Auditorium at Boston Public Library in Copley Square

item.description:
Summer Cinema: Lakshmi and Me on 08/03/2010 from 6:00PM to 8:00PM.

This screening is free and open to the public.



Location:
Boston Public Library (Copley Square Branch)
700 Boylston Street
Rabb Lecture Hall
Boston, MA 02116
(Boston - Back Bay/BeaconHill/South End)



The screening will take place in the Johnson Building (the new library) in the Rabb Lecture Hall. The entrance to this building is on Boylston Street. When you enter the building, take the stairs that are to the left of the information desk. Go to the basement level and the Rabb Lecture Hall is next to Audiovisual Services.



Check out the website for more background: www.pbs.org/independentlens/lakshmiandme

If you want to sign up to volunteer for this project though Boston Cares:
http://bostoncares.or...
item.name: Indian Documentary Screening - Laxmi and Me
